articles.author: Kerry Wan
articles.title: CES 2026: 7 biggest news stories across TVs, laptops, and other weird gadgets you missed - ZDNET
articles.description: It's a wrap for the world's largest technology trade show - here are the top announcements throughout the week-long event.
articles.content:
By: Nina Raemont, Wearables and Health Editor / Jan. 3 at 6:42 p.m. ET
It was 11 years ago when Pebble unveiled its first-generation round smartwatch, the Pebble Time Round. Eleven years later, the … [+1074 chars]
